title: High Dependency on Regional Imports
description: In 2023, 50.79% of Nicaragua's total merchandise imports came from low- and middle-income economies in Latin America and the Caribbean, indicating a strong regional trade dependency.

title: Minimal Financial Support from UNDP
description: In 2016, Nicaragua received a net official flow of -$29,206.86 from UNDP, highlighting a significant lack of financial support from this UN agency.
